revised_title: Demographic Factors Influencing Mental Health in Urban Areas
tldr: This article discusses the relationship between demography and mental health, focusing on the role of social norms and family size in underdeveloped areas. The author highlights the importance of understanding cultural norms and societal institutions in controlling fertility rates. The article also explores various fertility control practices, such as contraception and abortion, and their impact on mental health in urban areas.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences > Demography and Mental Health
